paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

patients.phenotype: Congenital Long QT Syndrome with ventricular tachycardia and second-degree AV block

individual_records.phenotype_details: Congenital Long QT Syndrome with ventricular tachycardia and second-degree AV block
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing of this case revealed a KCNH2 missense mutation (S624R).

functional_data.summary: No functional analysis of this mutation has been performed.

variants.segregation_data: Neither of the parents had any mutation in this locus.
variants.additional_notes: The parents' QTc intervals were 440 ms and 390 ms, respectively.
key_quotes: Genetic testing of this case revealed a KCNH2 missense mutation (S624R).
His mother’s QTc was 440 ms, and his father’s was 390 ms.

patients.phenotype: Congenital Long QT Syndrome with fetal tachycardia and second-degree AV block

individual_records.phenotype_details: Congenital Long QT Syndrome with fetal tachycardia and second-degree AV block
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Her genetic testing identified the KCNH2 missense mutation (T613M), identical to that of her father.

functional_data.summary: No functional analysis of this mutation has been performed.

variants.segregation_data: The family history was positive for a paternal KCNH2 missense mutation (T613M).
variants.additional_notes: The father had a syncopal episode related to the mutation.
key_quotes: Her genetic testing identified the KCNH2 missense mutation (T613M), identical to that of her father.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for KCNH2 variants were successfully extracted.
